Html:
Hi,

I noticed that when a RibbonButton is displayed with a large image, and a label long enough to need two lines, that the bottom parts of some letters (g, y, p, etc. - letters that hang lower than most letters) are being clipped off.  Could somebody please let me know if there is a workaround for this?

Thanks in advance,
Alex

Hi Alex,

Thanks for reporting this!  This appears to be a bug.  I've filed it in our database and we will fix it for V1.  In the meantime, I think you will need to retemplate the offending control(s) and add enough of a margin to leave space for the tails of the letters.

Thanks!
Samantha
